Name: Lawnmower Game 2: Drifter
About the game: INTRODUCTION: Lawnmower Game 2: Drifter is direct sequel to Lawnmower game. Now player can drive with more faster lawnmowers in 3 different gamemodes. GAMEMODES: Open World: Cut grass samestyle than in first lawnmower game. Now lawnmower is much faster and there is damage system. Player need to avoid cactuses which cause damage. Player also can increase health by picking wrenches. 1 Open world Survival gamemode: Drive with lawnmower and try to find hidden coins under limited time. There damageable objects which also need to avoid, like bombs, cactuses and spikes. Pick up wrenches and increase health. Survival gamemode contains 4 levels Timetrial: Drive with lawnmower in different kind of tracks and try to make First place time. There is savesystem which saves player best lap and total track time. Player can also use nitrosystem few times per each lap. 6 tracks
